OFFICE MANAGER
September 12, 1962
Mr. William G. Harley
President, NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
In order to assist with your news reporting, I am hereby
appointing Mr. Lou Peneguy of this office as regional reporter
for NAEB Region II. He is accustomed to working with Betty,
and I am sure they will find it mutually helpful.
Sincerely yours,
Raymond D. Hurlbert
RDH/ml General Manager
cc: Mrs. Betty McKenzie
The Nation’s first ETV network telecasts simultaneously over four channels. Programming is originated by Auburn University, the Bir¬
mingham Area Educational Television Association, the University of Alabama (which is also a NET affiliate), and CBS-TV and NBC-
TV documentary programs and educational telecourses.
